title: The life of Bernard Gilpin a man most holy and renowned among the northerne English. Faithfully written by the Right Reverend Father in God George Carleton Lord Bishop of Chichester, and published for the sake of his common auditors, by whom it was long since earnestly desired.
author: Carleton, George, 1559-1628.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-street,
